definition: lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment/all is quiet/a dead calm (at sea)
wind/news/style/custom/manner/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
surname Ping
wave/breaker/unrestrained/dissipated/to stroll/to ramble
still/calm/quiet/not moving

sentences.english: Life just like an ocean, not always calm maybe paradises sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 生活就像大海不總是風平浪靜也有驚濤駭浪時。

sentences.english: Before most big storms there is that moment of calm.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數暴風來臨之前總有一段時間風平浪靜。

sentences.english: Endure a calm, step back broad sky.
sentences.chinese: 忍一時風平浪靜，退一步海闊天空。

sentences.english: Step back and calm, a sports.
sentences.chinese: 退一步風平浪靜，忍一時海闊天空。

sentences.english: True Nobility In a calm sea every man is a pilot.
sentences.chinese: 風平浪靜的大海，每個人都是領航員。

sentences.english: Such a boat is fit only for a calm sea.
sentences.chinese: 這種船隻適於在風平浪靜的海上航行。

sentences.english: The battle against the green-eyed monster is hard enough at the best of times .
sentences.chinese: 平日裏風平浪靜的時候和嫉妒作鬥爭就已經夠艱難了。

sentences.english: In a calm sea every man is a pilot.
sentences.chinese: 風平浪靜的大海，每個人都是領航員。

sentences.english: Seas were calm and within a short time turned azure blue in color.
sentences.chinese: 海上風平浪靜，海水很快就變成了蔚藍色。

sentences.english: The true nobility is in being superior to your previous self. What's your opinion?
sentences.chinese: 在風平浪靜的大海上，每個人都是領航員。

sentences.english: "Three Line", seemingly the most unusual terrain and calm passions Chung.
sentences.chinese: “三點一線”，看似尋常最崎嶇，風平浪靜湧激情。
今天是個風平浪靜的日子。

sentences.english: In a calm sea every man is a pilot.
sentences.chinese: 在風平浪靜的海面上，每一個人都可以成爲領航員。

sentences.english: They might be wary that you'll be overextending yourself.
sentences.chinese: 他們可能擔心過多就會風平浪靜。

sentences.english: Of those calm solitudes is there.
sentences.chinese: 風平浪靜地在那裏獨居良久。

sentences.english: Endure a moment, calm, step back, a brighter future.
sentences.chinese: 忍一時，風平浪靜，退一步，海闊天空。

definition: perilous situation
shaking one to the core/extremely disturbing/hair-raising (idiom)
howling wind and torrential rain (idiom)/(fig.) difficult, dangerous situation
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
to retreat/to shrink back
wind and waves/stormy sea
to shake/to jolt/to bump
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
dangerous/ruthless/treacherous
to turn over/to surge/to churn/to rummage/raging (torrent)
dark cloud
(of sound) to never stop/to fall incessantly on the ear/to linger on
boundless/limitless
surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale
billows/great waves (fig. of a story with great momentum)
